purpose.p: An instruction that specifies a message to be output.

usage.p: Either the select attribute or a sequence constructor or both may be used to create the message content. If both are used the results are concatenated.
Stylesheet execution may be terminated by setting the terminate attribute to 'yes'.
The output location is implementation dependent, but is typically the console, or a log file.

property.name: terminate
property.description: Whether or not to terminate processing after the message.

examples.codeblock: <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/xml;charset=UTF-8"/> <title> <xsl:value-of select="$title"/> </title> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"> <xsl:attribute name="href"> <xsl:value-of select="$style"/> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:message>Head section link processed</xsl:message> </link> </head>
